content:
BaseProperty Class

In this Article

Represents a Rule property.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Arguments")]
public abstract class BaseProperty : System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • BaseProperty

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

This represents the schema information (name, allowed values, and so on) of a Rule property. Because this is just schema information, there is no field such as "Value" to get/set the value of this property. If you manually instantiate this class, call BeginInit before you set the first property of the object and EndInit after you set the last property.

Constructors summary

BaseProperty()

Default constructor. Required for deserializtion from a persisted format.

Properties summary

Arguments

Gets or sets a list of arguments for this property.
Category

Gets or sets the name of the category to which this property belongs.
ContainingRule

Gets or sets the Rule that contains this BaseProperty.
DataSource

Gets or sets the data source where the current value of this property is stored.
Default

Gets or sets the default value for this property.
Description

Gets or sets a description of this BaseProperty for use by a prospective UI client.
DisplayName

Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this BaseProperty.
F1Keyword

Gets or sets the keyword that is used to open the help page for this property.
HelpContext

Gets or sets the Help context to use when the user presses F1.
HelpFile

Gets or sets the Help file to use when the user presses F1.
HelpUrl

Gets or sets the URL of the Help page for this property. The page is opened when the user presses F1.
IncludeInCommandLine

Gets or sets a hint to the command-line constructor whether to include this property in the command line.
IsRequired

Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is required to have a value set.
Metadata

Gets or sets additional attributes of this BaseProperty.
MultipleValuesAllowed

Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether this property allows multiple values to be supplied/selected simultaneously.
Name

Gets or sets the name of this BaseProperty.
ReadOnly

Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is read-only.
Separator

Gets or sets the token used to separate a switch from its value.
Subcategory

Gets or sets the subcategory this property belongs to.
Switch

Gets or sets the switch representation of this property when the property represents a tool parameter.
SwitchPrefix

Gets or sets the prefix for the switch representation of this property when this property represents a tool parameter.
ValueEditors

Gets or sets the list of value editors for this property.
Visible

Gets or sets a hint to the UI client that tells it whether to display this property.

Methods summary

BeginInit()

See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit*.
EndInit()

See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit*.

Constructors

  • BaseProperty()

    Default constructor. Required for deserializtion from a persisted format.

    protected BaseProperty ();

Properties

  • Arguments

    Gets or sets a list of arguments for this property.

    public System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Argument> Arguments { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • List<Argument>

      Returns the list of arguments for this property.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • Category

    Gets or sets the name of the category to which this property belongs.

    public string Category { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the name of the category to which this property belongs.

    Remarks

    If the value of this field does not correspond to the Name property of a Category element that is defined in the containing Rule class, a default Category that has this name is auto-generated and added to the containing Rule class.

    This field is optional and is culture-invariant. When this field is not specified, this property is added to an auto-generated category named General (localized). This field cannot be set to the empty string.

  • ContainingRule

    Gets or sets the Rule that contains this BaseProperty.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule ContainingRule { get; }

    Property Value

    • Rule

      Returns the rule that contains this BaseProperty.

  • DataSource

    Gets or sets the data source where the current value of this property is stored.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.DataSource DataSource { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • DataSource

      Returns the data source where the current value of this property is stored.

    Remarks

    If the data source is defined, it overrides the DataSource property on the containing Rule.

    This field is mandatory only if the parent Rule does not have the data source initialized. The getter for this property returns only the DataSource that is set directly on this BaseProperty instance.

  • Default

    Gets or sets the default value for this property.

    public string Default { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the default value for this property.

    Remarks

    This field is optional. If the value is a StringProperty, semantics determine whether this field is culture-sensitive.

  • Description

    Gets or sets a description of this BaseProperty for use by a prospective UI client.

    public string Description { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the description of this BaseProperty.

    Remarks

    This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.

  • DisplayName

    Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this BaseProperty.

    public string DisplayName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the display name of this BaseProperty.

    Remarks

    This field is optional and is culture-sensitive. When this property is not set, it is assigned the same value as the Name property (and, therefore, would not be localized).

  • F1Keyword

    Gets or sets the keyword that is used to open the help page for this property.

    public string F1Keyword { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the keyword that is used to open the help page for this property.

    Remarks

    This form of specifying help takes precedence over HelpUrl and HelpFile + HelpContext.

    This field is optional and is culture insensitive.

  • HelpContext

    Gets or sets the Help context to use when the user presses F1.

    public int HelpContext { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      Returns the Help context to use when the user presses F1.

    Remarks

    This property uses the HelpFile property to display the Help context of the specified Help file.

    This field is optional. If this property, together with HelpFile, is specified, then the values of HelpUrl and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpString%2A> are ignored.

  • HelpFile

    Gets or sets the Help file to use when the user presses F1.

    public string HelpFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the Help file to use when the user presses F1.

    Remarks

    For more information, see HelpContext.

    This field is optional and is culture-insensitive.

  • HelpUrl

    Gets or sets the URL of the Help page for this property. The page is opened when the user presses F1.

    public string HelpUrl { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the URL of the Help page for this property.

    Remarks

    This property has a higher priority than the HelpContext+HelpFile and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpString%2A> properties. In other words, these properties are ignored if HelpUrl is set.

    This field is optional and is culture-insensitive.

  • IncludeInCommandLine

    Gets or sets a hint to the command-line constructor whether to include this property in the command line.

    public bool IncludeInCommandLine { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns the hint to the command-line constructor.

    Remarks

    Some properties are used only by the targets and are not to be included in the command line. Other properties, for example, task parameters, are included in the command line in the form of the switch/value that they emit. This field is optional and, by default, has the value true.

  • IsRequired

    Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is required to have a value set.

    public bool IsRequired { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns a flag that indicates whether this property is required to have a value set.

  • Metadata

    Gets or sets additional attributes of this BaseProperty.

    public System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.NameValuePair> Metadata { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • List<NameValuePair>

      Returns additional attributes of this BaseProperty.

    Remarks

    This can be used as a grab bag for additional metadata of this property that are not captured by the primary fields. Use custom UI to interpret the additional metadata because the shipped UI formats are not aware of these attributes.

    This field is optional.

  • MultipleValuesAllowed

    Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether this property allows multiple values to be supplied/selected simultaneously.

    public bool MultipleValuesAllowed { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns a switch that specifies whether this property allows multiple values to be supplied/selected simultaneously. If true, multiple values may be selected.

  • Name

    Gets or sets the name of this BaseProperty.

    public string Name { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the name of this BaseProperty.

    Remarks

    This field is mandatory and culture-invariant. The value of this field cannot be set to the empty string.

  • ReadOnly

    Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is read-only.

    public bool ReadOnly { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns true if this is a read-only property; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This field is optional and its default value is false.

  • Separator

    Gets or sets the token used to separate a switch from its value.

    public string Separator { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the token used to separate a switch from its value.

    Remarks

    The value specified here overrides the value specified for the parent rule separator.

    This field is optional and culture-invariant.

  • Subcategory

    Gets or sets the subcategory this property belongs to.

    public string Subcategory { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the subcategory this property belongs to.

  • Switch

    Gets or sets the switch representation of this property when the property represents a tool parameter.

    public string Switch { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the switch representation of this property.

    Remarks

    This field is optional and culture-invariant.

  • SwitchPrefix

    Gets or sets the prefix for the switch representation of this property when this property represents a tool parameter.

    public string SwitchPrefix { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the prefix for the switch representation of this property.

    Remarks

    The value specified here overrides the value specified for the SwitchPrefix of the parent Rule.

    This field is optional and culture-invariant.

  • ValueEditors

    Gets or sets the list of value editors for this property.

    public System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.ValueEditor> ValueEditors { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • List<ValueEditor>

      Returns the list of value editors for this property.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • Visible

    Gets or sets a hint to the UI client that tells it whether to display this property.

    public bool Visible { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns a hint to the UI client that tells it whether to display this property.

    Remarks

    This field is optional and has the default value true.

Methods

  • BeginInit()

    See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit*.

    public virtual void BeginInit ();
  • EndInit()

    See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit*.

    public virtual void EndInit ();
